title: Nomura Beats Goldman to Top Spot in a Record Year for Japan M&A
description: Nomura Holdings Inc. took back the top spot in advising on Japanese mergers and acquisitions in 2025 when deals related to the country hit a record.
content: Nomura Holdings Inc. took back the top spot in advising on Japanese mergers and acquisitions in 2025 when deals related to the country hit a record.
